## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description             | Type         | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------- | ------------ | ----------- |
| `axis`   | `axis`    | position of the tooltip | `"x" \| "y"` | `'y'`       |
| `text`   | `text`    | text of the tooltip     | `string`     | `undefined` |
